ModMetaData.name: Roof Support
ModMetaData.author: Match
ModMetaData.description:
Updated to 1.5
This mod will allow you to build patios, covered walkways, or massive rooms without collapsing the ceiling. These supports do not impede movement, nor provide cover. Don't forget to use the build roof command. Also, a safe radius will be shown when placing a support column.
Special thanks to Nommy, Igabod, Minus, Shinzy, Vas, Syrchalis, Beschi,and Proxyer.
